# DTG-MA vs Baselines Comparison

## Split MNIST (5 tasks, binary classification)

| Method | Accuracy | Forgetting | Time |
|--------|----------|------------|------|
| **DTG-MA (ours)** | **99.2%** | **0.0%** | 1683.8s |
| HAT | 85.6% | 16.6% | 85.0s |
| EWC | 59.9% | 49.5% | 103.4s |
| DER++ | 58.9% | 50.4% | 886.8s |
| PackNet | 55.6% | 42.5% | 38.4s |
| Fine-tuning | 53.9% | 56.9% | 36.3s |

## Key Findings

- **DTG-MA achieves 99.2% accuracy with 0.0% forgetting**
- DTG-MA outperforms HAT by +13.6% accuracy
- DTG-MA reduces forgetting by 16.6% compared to baselines
